blogPost.excerpt: SEED makes it painless for teams to use serverless. -- 🤖 Zero-config deployments for Serverless Framework and CDK apps, no build scripts needed 💫 Custom deployment infrastructure for 100x faster deployments 🖥️ And a dashboard to manage your environments

blogPost.title: SEED - 100x faster serverless deployments
blogPost.author: Lindsay Wiese-Amos
